ai-anya-e0105n33:1_0: There are three more according to the exposition of the teaching on the fourteenth, the explanation of the Dhamma, and the Discussion of the Dhamma, namely, the faithful verage, the teachers of the Dhamma, and his enlightenment comes about by understanding.
